title: Rupert Wells (rugby league)
text: Rupert Wells is a South African <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer for the <a href="Tuks%20Bulls">Tuks Bulls</a>. His position is wing. He is a <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">South African international</a>, and has played in the <a href="2013%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup%20qualifying">2013 Rugby League World Cup qualifying</a> against <a href="Jamaica%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Jamaica</a> and the <a href="United%20States%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">USA</a> He represented South Africa in the <a href="2017%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28Middle%20East-Africa%20play-off%29">Middle East-Africa play-offs</a> for the <a href="2017%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2017 Rugby League World Cup</a>.
